BR_text.BRsummary: The code_dir storage error log is not consistent with size
BR_text.BRdescription:
Organization Name:
 microsoft
 Short summary about the issue/question:
 When User code_dir_size is 0. There will be an error log says that dir is larger than 200MB.
 <denchmark-code>[INFO] User code_dir_size is 0
 hdfs://10.0.0.4:9000/qinsu/qinsu-test2_04320b0b is larger than 200MB, exit.
 </denchmark-code>
 
 The related bug location:
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/pai/blob/0f80208482eade027af88c61b4d58b78bf39b57a/src/rest-server/src/templates/yarnContainerScript.mustache#L262>https://github.com/Microsoft/pai/blob/0f80208482eade027af88c61b4d58b78bf39b57a/src/rest-server/src/templates/yarnContainerScript.mustache#L262</denchmark-link>
